description: The Herzberg Astronomy and Astrophysics Research Centre (HAA), National Research Council of Canada, located in Victoria, British Columbia, has a need for one (1) cryogenic RF probe station operating up to at least 67 GHz. This cryogenic RF probe station will be used in the development of high-sensitivity and low noise devices and their modeling for radio astronomy instrumentation.กรุณ จาก โก Ya $
